verses.verse: וַיִּקְבְּצ֧וּ <S%H6908><s%> gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <S%H6430><s%> Now the Philistines אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַחֲנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4264><s%> all their armies אֲפֵ֑קָה <S%H663><s%> to Aphek וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> and the Israelites חֹנִ֔ים <S%H2583><s%> pitched בַּעַ֖יִן <S%H5869><s%> by a fountain אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּיִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> which [is] in Jezreel

וְסַרְנֵ֤י <S%H5633><s%> And the lords פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines עֹֽבְרִ֔ים <S%H5674><s%> passed on לְמֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> by hundreds וְלַאֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> and by thousands וְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> but David וַאֲנָשָׁ֗יו <S%H376><s%> and his men עֹֽבְרִ֛ים <S%H5674><s%> passed on בָּאַחֲרֹנָ֖ה <S%H314><s%> in the rereward עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אָכִֽישׁ׃ <S%H397><s%> with Achish

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> Then said שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> What הָעִבְרִ֣ים <S%H5680><s%> What [do] these Hebrews הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָכִ֜ישׁ <S%H397><s%> [here]? And Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> unto the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines הֲלֽוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no זֶ֨ה <S%H2088><s%> is this דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> [Is] not this David עֶ֣בֶד ׀ <S%H5650><s%> the servant שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> has been אִתִּי֙ <S%H854><s%> for זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> these יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> which hath been with me these days אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> these שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> or these years וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> and I have found בוֹ֙ מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> no fault מִיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in him since נָפְל֖וֹ <S%H5307><s%> he fell עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> from הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this פ

וַיִּקְצְפ֨וּ <S%H7107><s%> were wroth עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> But שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> And the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֩ שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> with him and the princes פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines הָשֵׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> return אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> this fellow וְיָשֹׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> that he may go again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his מְקוֹמוֹ֙ <S%H4725><s%> to his place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you הִפְקַדְתּ֣וֹ <S%H6485><s%> which thou hast appointed שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> us וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יֵרֵ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> him and let him not go down עִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5973><s%> with בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> with us to battle וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> may become לָּ֥נוּ לְשָׂטָ֖ן <S%H7854><s%> he be an adversary בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> lest in the battle וּבַמֶּ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> what יִתְרַצֶּ֥ה <S%H7521><s%> to us for wherewith should he reconcile זֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲדֹנָ֔יו <S%H113><s%> master הֲל֕וֹא <S%H3808><s%> or בְּרָאשֵׁ֖י <S%H7218><s%> band הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> another הָהֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> of these

הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> is this דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> [Is] not this David אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> of whom יַעֲנוּ־ <S%H6030><s%> of whom they sang ל֛וֹ בַּמְּחֹל֖וֹת <S%H4246><s%> one to another in dances לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> slew שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> Saul בַּֽאֲלָפָ֔יו <S%H505><s%> his thousands וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David [בְּרִבְבֹתֹו כ] (בְּרִבְבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7233><s%> many ק) ס

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> called אָכִ֜ישׁ <S%H397><s%> Then Achish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> about חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> unto him Surely [as] the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשָׁ֣ר <S%H3477><s%> thou hast been upright אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you וְט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [is] good בְּ֠עֵינַי <S%H5869><s%> in my sight צֵאתְךָ֨ <S%H3318><s%> and thy going out וּבֹאֲךָ֤ <S%H935><s%> and thy coming in אִתִּי֙ <S%H854><s%> in בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> with me in the host כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not מָצָ֤אתִֽי <S%H4672><s%> for I have not found בְךָ֙ רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> evil מִיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in thee since the day בֹּאֲךָ֥ <S%H935><s%> of thy coming אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto me unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וּבְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> thee not הַסְּרָנִ֖ים <S%H5633><s%> nevertheless the lords לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> are not ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> favour אָֽתָּה׃ <S%H859><s%> you

וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> Wherefore now return וְלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> accomplish רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> adversity בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> affliction סַרְנֵ֥י <S%H5633><s%> not the lords פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָכִ֗ישׁ <S%H397><s%> unto Achish כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> But מֶ֤ה <S%H4100><s%> what עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <S%H6213><s%> But what have I done וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what מָּצָ֣אתָ <S%H4672><s%> ? and what hast thou found בְעַבְדְּךָ֔ <S%H5650><s%> in thy servant מִיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> so long as אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> when הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> came לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> I have been with thee עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> may not אָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> that I may not go וְנִלְחַ֔מְתִּי <S%H3898><s%> fight בְּאֹיְבֵ֖י <S%H341><s%> against the enemies אֲדֹנִ֥י <S%H113><s%> of my lord הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> king

וַיַּ֣עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered אָכִישׁ֮ <S%H397><s%> And Achish וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִד֒ <S%H1732><s%> to David יָדַ֕עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> that thou [art] good אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> in בְּעֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> in my sight כְּמַלְאַ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> as an angel אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> nevertheless שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> notwithstanding the princes פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> have said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> must not יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> He shall not go up עִמָּ֖נוּ <S%H5973><s%> us בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> with us to the battle

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> Wherefore now rise up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְעַבְדֵ֥י <S%H5650><s%> servants אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> with thy master's אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בָּ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> that are come אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֣ם <S%H7925><s%> with thee and as soon as ye be up early בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְא֥וֹר <S%H215><s%> and have light לָכֶ֖ם וָלֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> depart

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <S%H7925><s%> rose up early דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> So David ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַֽאֲנָשָׁיו֙ <S%H582><s%> and his men לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to depart בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> to return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines עָל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> went up יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> to Jezreel ס
